ABOUT

Robin Wilkie

I'm a web developer based in Glasgow, Scotland. After working in newspapers as a picture editor I recently graduated with a BSc in Web and Mobile Development with distinction. I specialise in front-end development using HTML, CSS, Javascript and PHP.

I'm constantly looking to improve my skills and understanding in all aspects of web and mobile development. Recently I've been looking into creating apps using React-Native. I also enjoy music, photography and drinking an unhealthy amount of coffee.
